Authors: Maria E Ordonez, Charles Wesley Barnes
Title:
Macrocyclic Edythea quitensis rust on Berberis hallii in
Ecuador
Abstract:
The full macrocyclic autoecious life cycle of five spore
stages was confirmed for Edythea quitensis on Berberis hallii in the
highlands of Ecuador. The spermogonial and aecial stages had not
previously been recorded. Spore descriptions and DNA sequence analysis
are included.
